title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
description: A turn-based RPG with unique real-time mechanics, making battles more immersive than ever. Explore a fantasy world inspired by Belle Époque France battling devastating enemies.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: Follows outlaw Arthur Morgan and his gang, led by Dutch Van der Linde, as they struggle to cope with the decline of the Wild West at the turn of the 20th century.

title: The Last of Us Part II
description: In a hostile, post-pandemic world, Joel and Ellie, brought together by desperate circumstances, must rely on each other to survive a brutal journey across what remains of the United States.

title: The Last of Us Part I
description: Experience the emotional storytelling and unforgettable characters in The Last of Us, winner of over 200 Game of the Year awards, rebuilt for modern platforms.

title: Baldur's Gate 3
description: Return to Faerun in a tale of fellowship and betrayal, and the lure of absolute power. Mysterious abilities are awakening inside you.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: The monster slayer Geralt of Rivia must find his adoptive daughter who is being pursued by the Wild Hunt, and prevent the White Frost from bringing about the end of the world.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
description: A young Kokiri boy discovers that his destiny is to free the Seven Sages and save the land of Hyrule from the treacherous sorcerer Ganondorf.

title: Mass Effect Legendary Edition
description: A compilation of the first three Mass Effect games, remastered with improved graphics and gameplay.

title: Death Stranding 2: On the Beach
description: Embark on an inspiring mission of human connection beyond the UCA. Sam and his companions set out on another journey to save humanity from extinction.

title: God of War Ragnarök
description: Kratos and his son Atreus face the oncoming Norse apocalypse, Ragnarok, in this epic conclusion to the Norse saga.

title: God of War
description: After wiping out the gods of Mount Olympus, Kratos moves on to the frigid lands of Scandinavia, where he and his son must embark on an odyssey across a dangerous world.

title: Mass Effect 2
description: After being revived from death, Commander Shepard must assemble a team, battle a new threat, and make tough choices to save the galaxy from total annihilation.

title: Metal Gear Solid
description: A crack government anti-terrorist squad takes over an Alaskan nuclear disposal facility. Solid Snake is up for the task to infiltrate and thwart the terrorists' plans.

title: Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater
description: In 1964, a U.S. government operative codenamed Snake must infiltrate mountainous Soviet territory to rescue a scientist building a weapon of terrible power.

title: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic
description: A republic soldier, training to become a Jedi Knight, is given the task of halting the conquest of Darth Malak by discovering the location of the Star Forge.

title: Final Fantasy VII
description: A former soldier from an evil company joins a mercenary clan to fight the company he once served.

title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: Three very different criminals team up for a series of heists and walk into some of the most thrilling experiences in the corrupt city of Los Santos.

title: Red Dead Redemption
description: A former outlaw, John Marston, is forced by the federal government to hunt down the members of his old gang during the decline of the American frontier in 1911.

title: Elden Ring
description: In a dark fantasy world created by Hidetaka Miyazaki and George R. R. Martin, the player is a Tarnished who must restore the Elden Ring and become the Elden Lord.

title: Uncharted 4: A Thief's End
description: Thrown back into the dangerous underworld he'd tried to leave behind, Nathan Drake must decide what he's willing to sacrifice to save the ones he loves.

title: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas
description: In 1992, Carl CJ Johnson comes home after a family tragedy to find the streets of Los Santos overtaken by crime and corruption.

title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance II
description: Henry is sent to escort Sir Hans Capon on a diplomatic mission. After they are ambushed, the two young men embark on perilous adventures.

title: Batman: Arkham City
description: When part of Gotham is turned into a private reserve for criminals known as Arkham City, the Dark Knight is the only one who can stop the chaos.

title: Silent Hill 2
description: After receiving a letter from his late wife, James Sunderland heads towards Silent Hill to search for her, only to come across a terrifying road of truth and redemption.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
description: Link awakens from a deep slumber and sets out to save the kingdom of Hyrule from the malevolent Calamity Ganon.

title: Portal 2
description: Chell awakens in Aperture Science and must escape again, this time with the help of a personality core named Wheatley.

title: Half-Life 2
description: Gordon Freeman returns to fight the Combine, an alien empire that has conquered Earth, with help from the resistance.

title: BioShock
description: A plane crash survivor discovers the underwater city of Rapture and must fight against genetically altered inhabitants while uncovering the city's dark secrets.

title: Dark Souls
description: An undead warrior must ring the Bells of Awakening and discover the fate of the undead in a dark and interconnected world.

title: Resident Evil 4
description: Special agent Leon S. Kennedy is sent on a mission to rescue the U.S. President's daughter from a sinister cult in rural Spain.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom
description: Link must explore the lands above and below Hyrule to find a way to stop Ganondorf from destroying the kingdom.

title: Horizon Forbidden West
description: Aloy travels to the Forbidden West, a majestic but dangerous frontier, to find the source of a mysterious plague.

title: Ghost of Tsushima
description: In the late 13th century, the Mongol empire has invaded Japan. Jin Sakai must become the Ghost to protect his homeland.

title: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
description: A shinobi known as Wolf must rescue his kidnapped lord and seek revenge on his enemies in feudal Japan.

title: Hades
description: Zagreus, the son of Hades, attempts to escape from the Underworld to reach Mount Olympus, aided by the Olympian gods.

title: Disco Elysium
description: A detective with a unique skill system and a deeply personal case to solve wakes up with amnesia in a strange city.

title: Persona 5 Royal
description: A group of high school students discover they can enter the hearts of corrupt adults and steal the source of their evil desires.

title: Hollow Knight
description: A small knight explores the vast, interconnected underground kingdom of Hallownest, battling insects and uncovering ancient secrets.

title: Celeste
description: A young woman named Madeline attempts to climb Celeste Mountain while confronting her inner demons.

title: Bloodborne
description: A Hunter awakens in the decrepit city of Yharnam, known for its healing blood, and must uncover the city's terrifying secrets.

title: Undertale
description: A child falls into the Underground, a realm of monsters, and must find their way home while deciding the fate of all monsters.

title: NieR: Automata
description: In a distant future where Earth has been invaded by aliens, androids fight a proxy war against machine lifeforms.

title: Control
description: Jesse Faden becomes the new Director of a secret government agency and must use supernatural abilities to fight an otherworldly threat.

title: Death Stranding
description: Sam Porter Bridges must reconnect isolated cities in a post-apocalyptic America while avoiding creatures from a mysterious realm.

title: Outer Wilds
description: An astronaut explores a solar system stuck in a time loop, uncovering the secrets of an ancient alien civilization.

title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: A mercenary outlaw named V goes after a one-of-a-kind implant that is the key to immortality in the megalopolis of Night City.

title: Final Fantasy XVI
description: Clive Rosfield embarks on a dark and dangerous journey seeking revenge across the realm of Valisthea.

title: Spider-Man
description: An experienced Peter Parker fights crime and balances his personal life in a new story set in the Marvel universe.

title: Returnal
description: A space pilot crashes on an alien planet and finds herself in a time loop, dying and restarting repeatedly.

title: It Takes Two
description: A couple on the brink of divorce is magically transformed into dolls and must work together to save their relationship.

title: Deathloop
description: An assassin stuck in a time loop must eliminate eight targets before midnight to break the cycle.

title: Resident Evil Village
description: Ethan Winters searches for his kidnapped daughter in a mysterious village filled with horrifying creatures.

title: Mass Effect 3
description: Commander Shepard rallies the galaxy's forces to defeat the Reapers in an all-out war for survival.

title: Doom Eternal
description: The Doom Slayer returns to fight against the demonic forces of Hell across Earth and beyond.

title: Alan Wake 2
description: FBI agent Saga Anderson investigates ritual murders while writer Alan Wake tries to escape the Dark Place.

title: Stardew Valley
description: A player inherits their grandfather's old farm and must restore it while building relationships in the local town.

title: Divinity: Original Sin 2
description: A group of Source users must escape from Fort Joy and defeat an ancient evil threatening Rivellon.

title: Metroid Dread
description: Bounty hunter Samus Aran investigates the mysterious planet ZDR while being hunted by deadly robots.

title: Ori and the Will of the Wisps
description: Ori embarks on a new journey to discover a world beyond the forest of Nibel and find her true destiny.

title: The Last Guardian
description: A boy and a giant creature named Trico form an unlikely bond as they work together to escape a mysterious valley.
